mapper.update: UPDATE UNIVERSITY SET UNIVERSITYNAME=#{universityName}, UNIVERSITYTEL=#{universityTel},UNIVERSITYLATITUDE=#{universityLatitude}, UNIVERSITYLONGITUDE=#{universityLongitude} WHERE UNIVERSITYSEQ=#{universitySeq}
mapper.select: SELECT A.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, A.UNIVERSITYNAME AS universityName, A.UNIVERSITYTEL AS universityTel, A.UNIVERSITYLATITUDE AS universityLatitude, A.UNIVERSITYLONGITUDE AS universityLongitude FROM UNIVERSITY A WHERE A.UNIVERSITYSEQ != 9999 ORDER BY A.UNIVERSITYNAME ASC
